## Description {#details}

An analysis pass to compute the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraph">CallGraph</a></code> for a <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a></code>.

This class implements the concept of an analysis pass used by the <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9c9208365fd9ce11392b4d79485e259">ModuleAnalysisManager</a></code> to run an analysis over a module and cache the resulting data.

Definition at line 301 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/callgraph-h">CallGraph.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### run() {#ae19338f2306a65118817d2794271f9c3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CallGraph llvm::CallGraphAnalysis::run (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9c9208365fd9ce11392b4d79485e259">ModuleAnalysisManager</a> &amp;)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Compute the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraph">CallGraph</a></code> for the module <code>M</code>.

The real work here is done in the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraph">CallGraph</a></code> constructor.
